tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Very fair. Don\'t buy/rent the book. I never used it. Review his lecture notes and LEARN THE FORMULAS and you should do fine. Summer course consisted of 2 midterms, 1 hw, and 1 final. 1 midterm in class. The other midterm, the hw and final were take home.

comments: only teach during summer and winter.I took couple bad Profs like H. Sardy for the others econ course. I know how good he is. Best of the best prof in BC Econ Department. tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Great funny Prof. A very hard class and not easy to understand. He allow formula sheet. BUT YOU ALSO NEED TO STUDY HARD. Not a easy A. No Textbook. He make his own notes for student. STAT isnt easy but he make it clear. Highly recommended to take him for ECON 30.2 and ECON 20.1. I also wish he will teach ECON 10.1.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Took this class in intersession. A very hard class and not easy to understand. He has a thick accent, but is very pleasant and is willing to go over the work until you understand it. He\'s fair grader, once he sees you put some effort in the class. He only teaches during winter & summer sessions.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He\'s great. Work is not easy but he is very clear with explaining. Took during the summer,had three exams. However he gives a practice exam that is identical to the exam and omg cheat sheet. Plus you dont have to buy a book!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
